You are an evil mage who tried to gain immortality by casting the ultimate spell.. But you failed kinda. You are immortal but you can't move and must hop from body to body to move! When you change your body you kill your previous host, your only hope is going deeper and deeper into the castle and hopefully find a permanent body!

The Web version has one of the sounds (The select sound) for some reason gargled up, I tried fixing it but I can't seem to find a way. For a better experience download the standalone version.

I wanted to continue working on the last day of the jam but some unfortunate events happened, and well I wasn't in a good mental place to continue, still I hope all of you like what I did manage to finish!
